description: This is a XC/Trail bike trackLocated in the Don Getty Wildland Provincial Park, Southwest of Longview AB.This Alberta SRD Public Land Use Zone is an excellent place to leave the world behind and really enjoy mother nature. This area is a NON-MOTORIZED Vehicle area
directions: From Calgary, AB		1. Head South to Longview, AB            Take 22 through Millarville/Turner Valley/ Black Diamond            Take Deerfoot/ AB Hwy 2 through Okotoks/ Black Diamond	2. Turn West onto Hwy 541 (Right in front of Esso)	3. Turn South (left) onto Hwy 940             This road may be seasonally closed 		4. Continue down road for approximately 10.5 km             It is located after the Etherington Trail Camping Area	5. Destination will be on the right
title: Cataract Creek West Loop
